glosses: grammage (the mass per area of paper measured in grams per square meter (g/m²))
weight of any market products in grams

examples.text: BİM'den eksik gramajlı ürün iddialarına dair açıklama geldi!
examples.translation: BİM made a public statement regarding claims of underweight products.

examples.text: Paketli gıdalarda gramaj hilesi! Üzerindeki ile tartıdaki gramaj aynı değil!
examples.translation: Weight fraud with packaged goods! What it says on the package and the value read on the scale aren't the same!

examples.text: Bu bisküvinin gramajı daha yüksek ama. Bu daha kârlı.
examples.translation: But these crackers weigh more. It makes more sense to buy this.
